pages.text: Ultimate Compression has a compressed version of all vanilla armor sets. They are crafted in the same way as usual but they will have increased durability and full sets will give bonus potion effects.

All the armor recipes are similar as Vanilla Minecraft. For any further information you can always check the Official Ultimate Compression Wiki or check the recipes shown within JEI. $(br)$(l:https://github.com/VoidCallerZ/UltimateCompression_1.18.x/wiki)Official Ultimate Compression Wiki$(/l)
